summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gaming Headphones Chamvict Xbox One Headset with Stereo Sound Ps4 Headset with Mic Noise Canceling for PS4,PC,Laptop,Cell Phone,Xbox,Find Enemies Before They Find You Review Date: 2019/06/23 Store: Chamvict Product Description: ['Why to choose us', "1. 【Splendid stereo audio output】Bring you an immersive game experience with stereo sound.You can get clear sound and accurately judge the enemies’ direction especially in “Playerunknown's Battlegrounds” 2. 【360° Noise canceling mic】We adopt intelligent chip to cancel outside noise.Just enjoy your own game world.You can judge the enemies direction and shoot in time without any noise.Victory is yours!The mic is flexible and can be adjusted to different angle for 360° 3. 【Comfy for long time wearing】With an extreme light of 0.87pounds, it is professionally designed for long time wearing and relieve your tiredness.The earmuff is breathable and soft, which can give your ear a comfy touch with less stress and keep cool when gaming for long time 4. 【Skin-friendly earmuff】Made of superior PU leather material, the earmuff is friendly to your skin 5. 【Convenient volume and mic adjustment】You can adjust game sound volume via the pulley and turn on/off mic via the switch anytime when don’t use it", 'Tips for PS4', '1. Plug 3.5mm cable into the console 2. Long press PS4 button and go to system setting 3. Go to “PERIPHERAL MACHINE”, ”ADJUST SOUND AND DEVICES”, choose “OUTPUT TO THE HEADPHONES”, select “ALL AUDIO”', 'Multiple platform compatibility', '★Play station 4 ★Nintendo switch/3DS ★Cell phone with 3.5mm audio interface ★Xbox one/360: It need a microsoft adapter(not included) when connect to old version xbox one ★Laptop/PC/macbook: Need a pc extension cord(included), plug mic and audio cord into your PC, laptop, macbook', 'Specification', '★Drive Diameter: 50mm ★Frequency: 20HZ-20KHZ ★Sensitivity: 102±3DB ★Mic Diameter: 4.0×1.5mm ★Mic Sensitivity: -38±3DB ★Cable Length: 6.6ft ★Size: 8.1×4.1×8.7inch ★N.W.: 0.873pounds ★G.W.: 1.12Pounds'] Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Chamvict', 'Color': 'Black', 'Form Factor': 'Over Ear', 'Connectivity Technology': 'Wired', 'Special Feature': 'Noise Canceling, Microphone Included', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 7.8 x 4.3 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'Dongguan Guanbiao Trading Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: These headphones have really decent quality for some budget headphones. The sound is pretty clear coming through and the ear pieces are super cushy.

Unfortunately, where these headphones fall short for me is the fit. They don’t fit snug at all, it’s almost as if the ear pieces just hang off the top of my ears. It’s definitely usable, but loose fitting in my opinion.

Other than that, they are pretty monster headphones, so just be sure you’re ready to be wearing size huge. I honestly wouldn’t have a problem with the size of the headphones if they fit better. I’m too afraid to make sudden movements because they feel like they will slip off. Review Title: Comfortable, but loose fitting Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: VIRTUE Shaping Spray, 7 oz Review Date: 2019/11/09 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 9.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '817023022168'} Review Text: I have medium thickness curly hair that is very frizz prone in humid weather, so a shaping spray is a must for me on those humid days. Since I have curly hair, I avoid any products with sulfates to prevent dry hair, so I’m very happy this product is sulfate free. It has a nice scent and does a great job preventing frizz. What I like most is that it doesn’t change the texture of my hair too much- none of that crunchy hair spray feel. It also has a nice scent, but it’s not too strong or overpowering. However, for the price point, I’m not sure I could justify continued use of this product. Review Title: Great hold without the crunch Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 9 Pieces Waterproof Shower Cap,Dot Plastic Shower Caps Waterproof Reusable Large Elastic Bath Hair Cap,Beauty Salon Spa Shower Caps Lace Elastic Band Printed Hat Protection Hair Bath Caps Shower Caps Review Date: 2021/05/01 Store: BeeGift Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {} Review Text: I use shower caps for a slightly unconventional purpose- covering my bread bowl while the dough proofs. I like it because they’re easy to take off and on when the dough needs to be folded, and they provide a more secure seal if I’m doing an overnight proof, so I don’t need to worry about the top of the dough drying out. These have worked great for that purpose. Review Title: Work great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Waxing Kit,Wax Warmer Hair Removal for Women Men,upgrade Portable Wax Kit with Scented Hard Wax Beans,Wax Machine for sensitive skin Full Body at home waxing or on vacation Review Date: 2021/05/15 Store: JAPUSOON Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'JAPUSOON', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 7.4 x 5.2 inches; 1.41 Pounds', 'UPC': '750440491196'} Review Text: The warmer works well, melting the wax in 10-15 minutes. After the wax is melted you can lower the temp to keep it warm, but not so hot that it will burn your skin. The kit comes with enough wax for at least a full leg wax (both legs). The kit comes with popsicle sticks for application. This was my first time home waxing, so it took me a bit to get my technique down, but definitely doable on your own. Review Title: Great for home use Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: KoluaWax | Beach Legs Hard Wax Beads (1lb Bag) | For Legs, Back & More | Lavender Review Date: 2021/05/17 Store: KoluaWax Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Body', 'Material Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '11.85 x 5.98 x 2.56 inches; 1.09 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'BEACHLEGS'} Review Text: This wax is elastic and covers large areas well. I have dark course hair, and this worked great on my legs. My skin is generally more on the sensitive side, but I had no irritation from this wax. Review Title: Good for legs Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ZZLOVE Amino Acids Body Wash for Men Women Moisturizing Shower Gel with Milk Protein Hydrolysate and Natural Plant Extracts Review Date: 2021/09/17 Store: ZZLOVE Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'ZZLOVE', 'Scent': 'Honey, Papaya', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 3.03 x 2.95 inches; 14.39 Ounces'} Review Text: The body wash is a little bit thicker, probably due to the moisturizing feature, so even though it’s a small bottle, I’m able to get a lot of use out of it. The scent is nothing out of the ordinary, it smells like your average white bar of soap, nothing fancy. Suds well when used with a loofa Review Title: Small bottle but works well Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. The sound is pretty clear coming through and the ear pieces are super cushy.

Unfortunately, where these headphones fall short for me is the fit. They don’t fit snug at all, it’s almost as if the ear pieces just hang off the top of my ears. It’s definitely usable, but loose fitting in my opinion.

Other than that, they are pretty monster headphones, so just be sure you’re ready to be wearing size huge. I honestly wouldn’t have a problem with the size of the headphones if they fit better. What I like most is that it doesn’t change the texture of my hair too much- none of that crunchy hair spray feel. It also has a nice scent, but it’s not too strong or overpowering. However, for the price point, I’m not sure I could justify continued use of this product. Review Title: Work great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Waxing Kit,Wax Warmer Hair Removal for Women Men,upgrade Portable Wax Kit with Scented Hard Wax Beans,Wax Machine for sensitive skin Full Body at home waxing or on vacation Review Date: 2021/05/15 Store: JAPUSOON Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'JAPUSOON', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 7.4 x 5.2 inches; 1.41 Pounds', 'UPC': '750440491196'} Review Text: The warmer works well, melting the wax in 10-15 minutes. I have dark course hair, and this worked great on my legs. My skin is generally more on the sensitive side, but I had no irritation from this wax. The scent is nothing out of the ordinary, it smells like your average white bar of soap, nothing fancy. Suds well when used with a loofa Review Title: Small bottle but works well Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has enjoyed several positive experiences with their purchases. They found great value in budget headphones, appreciating their sound clarity and cushy ear pieces, which enhance long gaming sessions. A shaping spray received high praise for effectively preventing frizz without altering hair texture, indicating a reliable performance for curly hair. The waterproof shower caps excelled in securing dough during proofing processes, demonstrating versatility beyond conventional use. The waxing kit and wax beads also garnered appreciation for ease of use and effective hair removal, making home waxing a feasible task.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Some negative experiences were noted, particularly with the headphones, which were criticized for their loose fit, causing discomfort during gameplay. While the shaping spray was well-received, concerns about its price point were expressed, potentially discouraging continued use. The body wash was described as unremarkable in scent despite its effective moisturizing capabilities, indicating a lack of outstanding features for this purchase.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping history reflects a blend of positive and negative aspects. Comfort and functionality are common themes, especially in audio and hair care products, though issues such as product fit and value for money arose. The experiences highlight a tendency toward seeking effective, affordable solutions, with a few products falling short of expectations, particularly regarding fit and sensory appeal. Overall, the user appears to balance satisfaction with practical utility against a desire for enhanced product experiences.

target_interaction.title: Nice colors
target_interaction.text: These are nice colors for fall and winter- lots of rich, darker shades. I’m still a newbie will gel polish so my application technique is still a work in progress, but I can generally get the  polish to last at least a full week.
target_interaction.title_meta: Gel Nail Polish Kit with Gel Base and Top Coat, 12 Pcs All Seasons Skin Tones Pink Neutral Brown Gel Polish Kit, Soak Off LED Gel Nail Kit Manicure DIY Nail Art Home Salon
